>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.4wAicxCXZcPLSOVY]{Immortal Tutor (Su)}

The precision of Axis formed the foundation of your studies.

Spell: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.y8sU6bQ6ebTa3hZv]{Adamantine Shot}

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.0MGzD9xUD65W4ne1]{First Lesson}: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to three times the spell’s level.

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.6t0IZxwDSnPz4ew5]{Second Lesson}: You gain a +4 enhancement bonus to one Fortitude save against a death effect, disease, necromancy effect, paralysis effect, poison, sleep effect, or stun effect.

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.pb3lkpkWq67AvKEf]{Third Lesson}: At the end of each turn, you regain Stamina Points equal to twice the spell’s level.

Edit spell in the Details tab.

Spell Preperation should be set to Always Available. And Limited uses set to 1 of 1 /-Day.

Be sure to update the Spell level as you gain access to higher level spells.
